    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPerimeterStatistics

        public AbstractPerimeterStatistics(Statistics statisticAtom,
                                   Statistics statisticsHops)
        This constructor limits the size of the perimeter. Arbitrarily starts at radius 20 and finishes at radius of the data, we choose to increase 5 by 5.
        Parameters:
        statisticAtom -
        statisticsHops -

      • getNextRadiusInSize

        public int getNextRadiusInSize(int radiusSize)
        We increase the radius in 1 position, because it should be the most precise and agrees the best with theory. Previously, it was added 5 by 5 because statistics were done with this criteria
        Parameters:
        radiusSize - current radius size
        Returns:
        next radius size (current+1)

      • getMinRadiusInSize

        public int getMinRadiusInSize()
        Arbitrarily the minimum radius is 10
        Returns:
        10
